pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpenti, upassayo na sammati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:6.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti, upassayo na sammatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:7.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:7.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:7.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:11.1: “Vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:11.5: Gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
